name: Raegrin Mau

trait.name: Dark Devotion
text: Raegrin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Raegrin to sleep.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
text: <$title_short_name$> can attempt to hide even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 240
